task_sequence.Description: Task sequence, 1 = reward task first, 2 = punishment task first

burst_rating.Description: Noise burst unpleasantness rating (How unpleasant was the loud noise?, likert scale 0 to 4)

REWpos_rating.Description: Reward task positive feedback rating (How rewarding did you feel it was to gain 10 Cents? likert scale 0 to 4)

REWneg_rating.Description: Reward task negative feedback rating (How punishing did you feel it was to gain no money? likert scale 0 to 4)

PUNpos_rating.Description: Punishment task positive feedback rating (How rewarding did you feel it was to not experience the loud noise? likert scale 0 to 4)

PUNneg_rating.Description: Punishment task negative feedback rating (How punishing did you feel it was to gain no money/experience the loud noise? likert scale 0 to 4)

M5_REW_alpha.Description: Reward task alpha learning rate, Model M5: Decay All

M5_REW_beta.Description: Reward task beta inverse temperature, Model M5: Decay All

M5_REW_decay.Description: Reward task non-selected Q value decay parameter, Model M5: Decay All

M5_PUN_alpha.Description: Punishment task alpha learning rate, Model M5: Decay All

M5_PUN_beta.Description: Punishment task beta inversed temperature, Model M5: Decay All

M5_PUN_decay.Description: Punishment task non-selected Q value decay parameter, Model M5: Decay All

Excluded.Description: Reasons for excluding participant in the final study
